outputs.output_descr: The needs assessment will i) identify specific condition, legal provision and mechanisms that exist in the Zambian civil court system which can facilitate or inhibit the civil court system and main parameters of reforms; ii) criteria to monitor effectiveness of a reform programme; iii) identify capacity gaps in competencies and skills required to improve institutional/organizational functioning, mechanisms for upgrading staff qualifications and competencies as well as promotion of transparency in the civil court system; and, iv) identification of capacity gaps in the relations between the courts and the media and other stakeholders.

project_descr: The aim is to assist the Judiciary in Zambia to undertake a well-targeted needs assessment for modernization of the Civil Court System in Zambia.
project_title: Review of the Civil Court System 2013-2014
